text: The 2000–01 League of Ireland First Division season was the 16th season of the League of Ireland First Division. ==Overview== The First Division was contested by 10 teams and Dundalk F.C. won the division. ==Final table== ==Promotion/Relegation Play-off== Third placed Kilkenny City played off against Waterford United who finished in tenth place in the 2000–01 League of Ireland Premier Division. The winner would compete in the 2001–02 League of Ireland Premier Division. === 1st Leg === === 2nd Leg === UCD win 4-2 on penalties after extra time and retain their place in the Premier Division. ==See also== * 2000–01 League of Ireland Premier Division ==References== Category:League of Ireland First Division seasons Category:2000–01 in Republic of Ireland association football Ireland
title: 2000–01 League of Ireland First Division
